data.status: Futu numerator from company earnings release; Tiger HK-stock numerator not publicly available in same verifiable quarterly format
Futu numerator from company earnings release; Tiger HK-stock numerator not publicly available in same verifiable quarterly format
Futu numerator from company earnings release; Tiger HK-stock numerator not publicly available in same verifiable quarterly format

notes.why_proxy: HKEX公开页面可核验市场总成交额（月度），但未直接披露品牌级（富途/老虎）月度港股成交额。故采用‘公司披露港股成交额(季度)’与‘HKEX同季度总成交额’并列并计算代理占比。
notes.calculation_detail: HKEX同季度总成交额 = 该季度三个月的HKEX月总成交额求和；Futu港股成交额采用其季度业绩新闻稿中‘trading volume for Hong Kong stocks’字段（HK$）。
notes.tiger_status: 当前未在可核验公开源中拿到老虎按季度拆分的港股成交额字段，因此暂为空。
